description: Jimmy Fanz wakes early in the morning, gets dressed and leaves his apartment. He spots his neighbor Ricky Decker and follows him throughout the city. As Ricky runs his errands, Jimmy attempts to get his attention but Ricky remains oblivious. Jimmy breaks into Ricky’s apartment and showers off. He steams up the bathroom while cleaning off in Ricky’s shower. Ricky returns home to find a note written on his bathroom mirror that his intruder has fallen for him. He enters the bedroom to see a naked Jimmy waiting for him and ready for Ricky to have sex with him.
title: Fallen 4 U
